Events that occurred on 20 March.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1959 – Game designer Anders Blixt is born.
1966 – Director Kenji Kamiyama is born.
1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 294b.
1968 – Actor Lawrence Makoare is born.
1969 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Amy Ronald.
1997 – Translator Britt G. Hallqvist dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 2510:
Borondir is on his way in search of the Éothéod.
T.A. 3019:
The Host of the West marches towards the Black Gate.
Frodo and Samwise continue their journey along the road to Barad-dûr.
Faramir meets Éowyn in the Houses of Healing.
